title: Please ID (or suggest)
content:
Looking for fonts with same flavour (of course, would prefer a perfect match), free or commercial (already thought about bauhaus...). Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011320im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/test_6153.gif)

 [‹ (x) "Propane" Garamond-like face - Monotype Garamond, Palatino {Lex, Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011320/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43103 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need a font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011320/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43133 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ryuk

comments.content:
Well it’s not quite as quirky but I like ’Tierra’ from [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011320/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts/48)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011320im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/tierra_4600.jpg)

Buro Destruct [Sirca](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011320/http:/www.typedifferent.com/2003/index.html), which is the fifth font on this page is free download, and similar to your sample.

- Mike Yanega
